name: Pucca Jam
storyline:
As Pucca she must chase Garu in each level. You click the keys at the perfect time she will jump, head bump ninjas, and avoid obstacles.

As Garu he runs away from Pucca in each level. You click the keys at the perfect time he will jump, kick ninjas, and avoid obstacles.
summary: Pucca Jam is a fan made flash game. Press the correct letter on your keyboard when Pucca or Garu are over the blossom icon. The closer to the beat you are the more points you get!" Their is 6 levels in total (3 levels per character).
